aircraft.value: Albatross Transport - AC-5898-289 at Sector West Station

defect_observed.value: Trim tab actuator binding. Malfunction reported by flight crew.

root_cause.value: Improper calibration during last maintenance cycle

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Landing Gear component. Analysis of operational data indicated parameter deviation.

corrective_action.value: Replace entire assembly due to extent of damage

preventive_action.value: Issue technical bulletin to all operators

remarks_investigation.value: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.

remarks_design.value: Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate. Date: 16/01/2025 Authorized Signatory of Design: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality aspects reviewed. Manufacturing process controls are adequate. Recommend supplier quality audit. Date: 17/01/2025 Signature: Eng. K.N. Iyer

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Fleet experience reviewed. Similar occurrences noted on other platforms. Support fleet-wide inspection. Date: 21/01/2025 Signature: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality assurance framework assessed. Investigation process followed established protocols. Findings are valid. Date: 23/01/2025 Signature: Eng. K.N. Iyer

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Airworthiness implications assessed. Recommend issuance of technical directive for fleet-wide compliance. Date: 24/01/2025 Signature: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai
